description: Lists all AWS Chatbot Microsoft Teams channel configurations in an AWS account.

parameters.name: TeamId
parameters.description: The ID of the Microsoft Teams authorized with AWS Chatbot. To get the team ID, you must perform the initial authorization flow with Microsoft Teams in the AWS Chatbot console. Then you can copy and paste the team ID from the console. For more information, see Step 1: Configure a Microsoft Teams client in the AWS Chatbot Administrator Guide.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: An optional token returned from a prior request. Use this token for pagination of results from this action. If this parameter is specified, the response includes only results beyond the token, up to the value specified by MaxResults.

nested_items.name: TeamChannelConfigurations
nested_items.description: A list of AWS Chatbot channel configurations for Microsoft Teams.

nested_items.name: ChannelId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Microsoft Teams channel.

nested_items.name: ChannelName
nested_items.description: The name of the Microsoft Teams channel.

nested_items.name: TeamId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Microsoft Teams authorized with AWS Chatbot.

nested_items.name: TeamName
nested_items.description: The name of the Microsoft Teams Team.

nested_items.name: TenantId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Microsoft Teams tenant.

nested_items.name: ChatConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the MicrosoftTeamsChannelConfiguration associated with the user identity to delete.

nested_items.name: IamRoleArn
nested_items.description: A user-defined role that AWS Chatbot assumes. This is not the service-linked role.

nested_items.name: SnsTopicArns
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the SNS topics that deliver notifications to AWS Chatbot.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ConfigurationName
nested_items.description: The name of the configuration.

nested_items.name: LoggingLevel
nested_items.description: Logging levels include ERROR, INFO, or NONE.

nested_items.name: GuardrailPolicyArns
nested_items.description: The list of IAM policy ARNs that are applied as channel guardrails. The AWS managed AdministratorAccess policy is applied by default if this is not set.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: UserAuthorizationRequired
nested_items.description: Enables use of a user role requirement in your chat configuration.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: A map of tags assigned to a resource. A tag is a string-to-string map of key-value pairs.

nested_items.name: TagKey
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: TagValue
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: Either ENABLED or DISABLED. The resource returns DISABLED if the organization's AWS Chatbot policy has explicitly denied that configuration. For example, if Amazon Chime is disabled.

nested_items.name: StateReason
nested_items.description: Provided if State is DISABLED. Provides context as to why the resource is disabled.
